decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in its own right and not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.
The following amendment is deemed to be accepted:

- Amendments to the site layout involving introduction of two additional refuse collection points, alteration of cycle stores, and refuse storage, upper fenestration and internal ground floor layouts.
The applicant is advised that this amendment relates solely to the item detailed above and shown on drawing numbers
1.	Non Material Amendment Summary Document by BDG Design (South) Ltd, dated November 2024;
2.	Covering Letter dated, 3 December 2024 and 17 June 2025;
and not to any other deviation from the approved drawings.
Furthermore, this amendment does not in any way alter or remove any previous conditions imposed on the original approved application reference P0883.20
description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P0883.20 dated 01/02/2022 to allow for alteration of Cycle stores, and refuse storage, upper fenestration and internal ground floor layouts and to the site layout involving introduction of two additional refuse collection points (Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide 120 residential dwellings comprising 78 houses and 42 flats(1bed x 12, 2bed x 53, 3bed x 55) with associated car parking, landscaping, open space, play space and infrastructure)
site_name: Havering College of Further and Higher Education
